docs.text: Metabolomics and Proteomics Datasets Schema This schema defines the structure for metabolomics and proteomics datasets, capturing essential metadata including investigators, affiliations, data citation, organism details, analysis type, and more. URI: https://w3id.org/brc/metaprot-datasets-schema Name: datasets Classes Class Description Dataset A dataset containing metabolomics and proteomics data. DatasetCollection None Individual An individual involved in the dataset. Organism None RelatedItem None Slots Slot Description affiliation Affiliation of the creator analysisType The type of analysis performed on the dataset bibliographicCitation Citation for the dataset brc Bioenergy Research Center affiliation creator List of creators involved in the dataset, where one must be the primary conta... creatorName Name of the creator datasets date The date the dataset was created or published description A detailed description of the dataset email Email address of the creator identifier Unique identifier for the dataset keywords Keywords associated with the dataset NCBITaxID NCBI taxonomy ID for the organism primaryContact Indicates if the creator is the primary contact relatedItem Related publication or item relatedItemIdentifier Identifier or URL for the related item relatedItemType Type of the related item, e repository The repository where the dataset is stored scientificName Scientific name of the organism species Species information for the organism(s) studied title The title of the dataset Enumerations Enumeration Description AnalysisType BRCEnum Types Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci...
